indonesianEntityForm__bankAccountDetails: Kami meminta informasi rekening bank untuk tujuan validasi. Selain itu, rekening bank ini akan ditambahkan sebagai opsi pilihan untuk tujuan withdraw pembayaran yang diterima oleh akun Xendit Anda. Dengan menambahkan rekening bank ini, Anda memberikan Xendit izin untuk melakukan settlement dana dari saldo Anda ke rekening bank ini.

phEntityForm__kindlyProvideInformation: Kindly provide the following information (<1>*</1> denotes a compulsory field).
phEntityForm__bankAccountDetailsNoteOne: Bank account information is required for validation purposes. This will be the designated bank account should you wish to withdraw your funds from your Xendit account.
phEntityForm__bankAccountDetailsNoteTwo: By adding this bank account, you are granting Xendit permission to settle funds from your Xendit account balance to your bank account.
phEntityForm__authorizedSignatoryNote: It is preferable to provide the details of the person authorized by your business entity to sign our service agreement

phDocuments__uploadDocumentsNote: <0>Note:</0> Xendit may request additional documents when necessary for compliance and enhanced due diligence.
phDocuments__uploadGovernmentIssuedIdDes: Kindly upload <1>one Primary ID</1> (such as passport, driver's license) or <3>two Secondary ID</3> (such as police clearance, AFP ID). Click <5>here</5> to view full list of valid ids.
